,temp_warehouse_display.warehouse_name as temp_goods_list_goods_sort_display ,temp_war_display.name as temp_goods_list_warehouse_type_display

LEFT JOIN t_dep temp_dep_display ON temp_dep_display.dep_id = temp_goods_list.department LEFT JOIN t_user temp_manager_display ON temp_manager_display.user_id = temp_goods_list.attn
LEFT JOIN t_warehouse temp_warehouse_display ON temp_warehouse_display.warehouse_id= temp_goods_list.warehouse_type_id LEFT JOIN t_par_war_goods_type temp_war_display ON temp_war_display.war_goods_type_id = temp_goods_list.goods_sort_id
